flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win
dows in the area.

Its large eyes can
scan 360 degrees.
It looks in all directions to seek
out insects as its
prey.

It can see in all
directions without
moving its big eyes, helping it
spot attackers and
food right away.

YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degrees
without having to move its eyes.
It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair.
This POKMON uses its flying ability to
quickly chase down targeted prey.

YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degrees
without having to move its eyes.
It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden stops and turning midair.
This POKMON uses its flying ability to
quickly chase down targeted prey.

It can see 360 degrees without moving
its eyes. It is a great flier capable of
making sudden stops and turning midair to
quickly chase down targeted prey.

Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees.
It looks in all directions to seek out
insects as its prey.

If it flaps its wings really fast, it can
generate shock waves that will shatter
windows in the area.

Its eyes can see 360 degrees
without moving its head. It wont
miss prey--even those behind it.

Its eyes can see 360 degrees
without moving its head. It wont
miss prey--even those behind it.

It can hover in one spot by
flapping its wings at high speed. It
flits about to guard its territory.

If it flaps its wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter windows in the area.

Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees.
It looks in all directions to seek
out insects as its prey.

La vitesse de ses ailes lui permet
un vol stationnaire. Il surveille
ainsi tout son territoire.

It can hover in one spot by
flapping its wings at high speed. It
flits about to guard its territory.

La vitesse de ses ailes lui permet
un vol stationnaire. Il surveille
ainsi tout son territoire.

It can hover in one spot by
flapping its wings at high speed. It
flits about to guard its territory.

By flapping its wings at high speed,
it can fly freely through the air.
Even sudden stops are no problem.

By flapping its wings at high speed,
it can fly freely through the air.
Even sudden stops are no problem.

Il voit  360 sans avoir  tourner la tte. Il ne loupe
jamais une proie, mme dans son dos.

Mit seinen Augen hat es einen Blickwinkel von
360 Grad. Es sieht sogar Beute, die sich hinter ihm
befindet.

Su campo visual es de 360 sin girar la cabeza.
Detecta hasta las presas que estn a su espalda.

Ha un campo visivo a 360 gradi senza muovere la
testa. Riesce a vedere persino le prede alle sue spalle.

Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its
head. It wont miss prey--even those behind it.

En battant des ailes trs vite, il peut gnrer une
violente onde de choc qui peut briser les fentres.

Schlgt es schnell mit den Flgeln, erzeugt es
Schockwellen, durch die sogar Fenster zerbersten.

Si aletea muy rpido, genera ondas expansivas
capaces de hacer aicos todas las ventanas prximas.

Se agita le ali ad altissima velocit pu generare onde
che distruggono i vetri delle finestre nella zona.

If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock
waves that will shatter windows in the area.

Yanma a un champ de vision de 360 degrs sans avoir besoin
de bouger les yeux. Il vole incroyablement bien et peut faire
des figures acrobatiques. Ce Pokmon descend en piqu
sur ses proies.

Yanma hat einen Blickwinkel von 360 Grad, ohne die Augen
bewegen zu mssen. Es ist ein groartiger Flieger und gebt
darin, pltzlich anzuhalten oder Wendemanver vorzunehmen.
So kann es sich blitzschnell auf Beute strzen.

Yanma tiene un ngulo de visin de 360 sin mover los ojos.
Es un gran volador, experto en hacer repentinas paradas y
cambios de direccin en el aire. Aprovecha la habilidad que
tiene de volar para lanzarse sobre su presa.

Yanma  dotato di un campo visivo a 360 gradi senza bisogno
di muovere gli occhi. Grazie alle grandi ali riesce a fermarsi
improvvisamente e virare a mezzaria. Sfrutta la sua abilit
in volo per abbattere la preda al suolo.

Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to
move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden
stops and turning midair. This Pokmon uses its flying ability to
quickly chase down targeted prey.

Yanma a un champ de vision de 360 degrs sans avoir besoin
de bouger les yeux. Il vole incroyablement bien et peut faire
des figures acrobatiques. Ce Pokmon descend en piqu
sur ses proies.

Yanma hat einen Blickwinkel von 360 Grad, ohne die Augen
bewegen zu mssen. Es ist ein groartiger Flieger und gebt
darin, pltzlich anzuhalten oder Wendemanver hinzulegen.
So kann es sich blitzschnell auf Beute strzen.

Yanma tiene un ngulo de visin de 360 sin mover los ojos.
Es un gran volador, experto en hacer repentinas paradas y
cambios de direccin en el aire. Aprovecha la habilidad que
tiene de volar para lanzarse sobre su presa.

Yanma  dotato di un campo visivo a 360 gradi senza bisogno
di muovere gli occhi. Grazie alle grandi ali riesce a fermarsi
improvvisamente e virare a mezzaria. Sfrutta la sua abilit
in volo per abbattere la preda al suolo.

Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having to
move its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making sudden
stops and turning midair. This Pokmon uses its flying ability
to quickly chase down targeted prey.

Its frail wings are so thin that one can see clear through them.
However, during flight these wings exhibit the power to churn
air with force enough to launch a house skyward.
